title: HPI 60 - The Buddha and I - Indian Influence on Islamic and European Thought
itunes:title: HPI 60 - The Buddha and I - Indian Influence on Islamic and European Thought
description: The impact of ancient Indian thought upon the Muslim scholar al-Bīrūnī and upon European thinkers like Hume, Hegel, and Schopenhauer.
content:encoded: The impact of ancient Indian thought upon the Muslim scholar al-Bīrūnī and upon European thinkers like Hume, Hegel, and Schopenhauer.
itunes:subtitle: The impact of ancient Indian thought upon the Muslim scholar al-Bīrūnī and upon European thinkers like Hume, Hegel, and Schopenhauer.
itunes:summary: The impact of ancient Indian thought upon the Muslim scholar al-Bīrūnī and upon European thinkers like Hume, Hegel, and Schopenhauer.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
